short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Analyze and distill any webpage into its fundamental contents with one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Site Fundamentals chrome extension is an initial tool for learning and doing research online. You can start with one webpage and let Site Fundamentals quickly analyze it. You will then have handles to more useful information on the key concepts, ideas, and entities included in the original webpage. 

Site Fundamentals is also useful when you find a news article you want to quickly dissect to learn the bigger story. 

The results of an analysis are presented in a CliffNotes like dashboard and include:

★ Extraction of keywords
★ Entity recognition with links to Google search, Twitter, and Instagram
★ Related YouTube videos
★ Clickable image gallery of key people, places and organizations
★ Hierarchy of topics covered
★ Emotional reaction
★ Sentiment analysis
★ Key definitions
